title: type help
content:
Hi!  
I'm a student in college and I'm trying to figure what kinds of fonts I could use with this image.  
I want to use three or two fonts that compliment this image. Im going for a 1950 look.  
Thank you  
any advice would be greatly appreciated!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ellasolo1_6641.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ellasolo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/typophile.com/files/ellasolo1_0.jpg) | 62.02 KB |
author: cgarcia25

comments.content:
Alex Steinweiss and Jim Flora were fairly prolific album-cover designers in the 1950s...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/whirled-peas-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/whirled-peas-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/whirled-peas-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/flora-dora-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/flora-dora-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/flora-dora-nf/")

Or, you could go with the beatnik vibe..  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/oo-boodlio-doo-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/oo-boodlio-doo-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/oo-boodlio-doo-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/indubitably-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/indubitably-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/indubitably-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/boop-boop-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/boop-boop-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/boop-boop-nf/")

The combination of this art with Oo-Boodlio-Doo would have a definite Ben Shahn vibe. Oo-Boodlio-Doo is inspired by Ad Lib, designed by Freeman Craw in 1961, and it's hard to imagine Craw wasn't influenced by Ben Shahn's distinctive handlettering. [Here's an example from 1955](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720171347/http:/americanculture.wustl.edu/dowd/f20_4354/fawcett/fawcett/Shahn_Chicago_Jazz_files/shapeimage_2.png).
